attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We should ban plactic carrier bags such as 'Tesco' or 'Sainsbury's' bags.
They are terrible for the environment and take years and years to rot down.
We should get rid of them to force people to use reusable bags

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
